subject: Can the Quickscript (QS) letter p be linked to the previous letter?
msgSnippet: Hello. I m making a QS Keyman driver which could handle the half forms and alternate forms automatically. I ve got a problem with the letter Pea (letter n°
messageBody:
Hello.

I'm making a QS Keyman driver which could handle the half forms and
alternate forms automatically.

I've got a problem with the letter Pea (letter n° 1).

If I write something about judo and I use the Japanese words "ippon seoi
nage", how should I write "ippon" in senior QS? Should I use two separate
Pea's, or should I use a half Pea linked to a following full Pea?

The "p" is geminated and I pronounce the two "p"'s separately, the 1st one
at the end of the 1st syllable and the 2nd one at the beginning of the
following syllable.

Thanks

JF
